name: RUSLICSTAN INVADES
description:
In an effort to turn the whole world into a similar, fetor-nefarious faschizophrenic substance, the crapper-state overflowed with the "russian world" is gushing, again!

The timely elimination of the "russian world" parts that has spilled out, which has revealed its face as a heinous savage horde of ruslic crapper-worshippers that came from the fetid marsh-mold lands - is a guarantee of peace and prosperity for Europe!

  • Different weapons to produce the good ruslics
  • Different Enemies that want to wear a Ruslicstan's new fashionable black packet suit and starving for a cargo 200 ticket
  • Different locations in the Ukrainian park!

Participate in saving Europe in a first-person meaty shooter!

Shoot&Push to dismember appliances-hungry ruslic army, that came to enslave Ukraine!
